channel.title: CVE Feed for Eliz Software -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Eliz Software -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-5960|2024-09-18T18:08:27.730Z -- eliz%20software -- panel
item.description: Plaintext Storage of a Password vulnerability in Eliz Software Panel allows : Use of Known Domain Credentials.This issue affects Panel: before v2.3.24.

item.title: CVE-2024-5959|2024-09-18T16:02:41.597Z -- eliz%20software -- panel
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Eliz Software Panel allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Panel: before v2.3.24.

item.title: CVE-2024-5958|2024-09-18T16:06:36.377Z -- eliz%20software -- panel
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Eliz Software Panel allows Command Line Execution through SQL Injection.This issue affects Panel: before v2.3.24.

item.title: CVE-2024-6878|2024-09-18T14:55:24.769Z -- eliz%20software -- panel
item.description: Files or Directories Accessible to External Parties vulnerability in Eliz Software Panel allows Collect Data from Common Resource Locations.This issue affects Panel: before v2.3.24.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Eliz Software Panel allows Command Line Execution through SQL Injection.This issue affects Panel: before v2.3.24.
